name: Tilevania (Loftus)
description:
Tilevania is a classic 2D platformer, and my first attempt at making a game in this genre! The core gameplay was built in Unity using course material provided by GameDev.tv, which I have then extended upon to create a complete game experience.

Run, jump and climb through 5 levels of increasing difficulty, avoiding hazards and monsters as you attempt to reach the goal. 

Controls:

  • Movement - A & D / LEFT & RIGHT
  • Jump - Space

Tips:

  • Every 5 coins you collect grants a new life, but if any coin seems too tricky to reach then it's up you whether it's worth the risk!
  • Mushrooms are bouncy! The further you fall before landing on one, the higher you'll bounce!

Credits:

  • Art - Foxfin
  • Music - Trevor Lentz & Victor Kraus
